## Tis‚Äô the holiday season, and some would say there‚Äôs no greater gift than the *gift of learning*.

If you‚Äôve got some time on your hands and want to deepen your expertise in building intelligent apps, consider tuning into **[AI Dev Days](https://developer.microsoft.com/reactor/series/s-1612/),** a FREE virtual series designed for developers who want hands-on experience with the latest in AI and agentic workflows.

### **What to Expect:**

- **Day 1, December 10, 2025:** Focus on **Azure**, **GitHub**, and building AI applications. Explore topics like **Agentic DevOps**, **Azure SRE Agent**, **Microsoft Foundry**, **MCP**, and **Models**. Get highlights from **Microsoft Ignite** and **GitHub Universe 2025**, plus a hands-on lab to put new product features into practice.
- **Day 2, December 11, 2025:** Learn how AI can make your coding better. Topics include **Agent HQ**, **VS Code**, **Visual Studio 2026**, **GitHub Copilot Coding Agent**, and **app modernization**. Enjoy more Ignite and GitHub Universe insights and a lab to grow your skills with the latest AI developer tools.

Whether you‚Äôre experimenting with AI or building production-ready solutions, these sessions will accelerate your innovation and help bring ideas to life.
